name: ahau
description: Desktop and mobile applications for gathering and sharing whakapapa (family trees, traditional knowledge). Built using Scuttlebutt

scripts.setup:mobile: cd mobile && npm install && npm run setup
scripts.dev:web: npm run dev:mobile-server 1>&2 | npm run dev:desktop:ui
scripts.dev:desktop:ui: kill-port 8080 && cd ui && npm run dev
scripts.dev:desktop: npm run dev:ui 1>&2 | npm --prefix desktop run dev
scripts.dev:pataka: cd pataka && npm run serve 1>&2 | npm run dev
scripts.release:desktop: npm run build-ui:desktop && cd desktop && npm run dist && cd .. && npm run move-release:desktop
scripts.release:pataka: npm run build-ui:pataka && cd pataka && npm run dist && cd .. && npm run move-release:pataka
scripts.release:android: cd mobile && npm run dist:android && cd .. && npm run move-release:android
scripts.release:android-dev: cd mobile && npm run dist:android-dev && cd .. && npm run move-release:android-dev
scripts.release:ios: cd mobile && npm run dist:ios && cd .. && npm run move-release:ios
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ui
scripts.clear:all: npm run clear 1>&2 | npm run clear:desktop 1>&2 | npm run clear:ui
